overview: Dr. El-Haddad's research interests include development of novel targeted and minimally invasive image-guided cancer therapies.
research_interests:
To develop novel, targeted and minimally invasive image-guided cancer therapies and to investigate the use of molecular imaging in interventional oncology for planning, guiding and monitoring image-guided interventions.
  *
associations: Cancer Imaging & Technology Center of Excellence
